Name: Box: Boxing
About the game: Join the community! Box:Boxing is a multiplayer virtual reality boxing game with action filled gameplay and unique graphics. Fight against the CPU or others players in the craziest scenarios you've ever seen and become the loser or the champion! It has a single player and a multiplayer mode, as well as a training mode with a boxing bag where you can get stronger and become the champion of the Box:Boxing world!
Meta Title: Box: Boxing: Apr 11, 2020, John's Project and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Box: Boxing? Check out the release date (Apr 11, 2020), developer insights from John's Project, and a complete game summary.
